SKT_FIRST.name: Dark Slash
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy.\nHas a <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> chance to grant Increased <color=#28d9ed>Critical Hit Chance</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy.\nHas a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000002_1]</color> chance to grant Increased <color=#28d9ed>Critical Hit Chance</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000002_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_SECOND.name: Dark Devil Dance
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks an enemy.\nIf this attack kills the target, performs an <color=#28d9ed>additional attack</color> against all enemies.
description: Attacks an enemy.\nIf this attack kills the target, performs an <color=#28d9ed>additional attack</color> against all enemies.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Dark Ruler's Slash
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies.\nIf this attack scores a critical hit, increases Critical Damage. After using this skill, reduces the skill cooldown of <color=#28d9ed>Dark Devil Dance</color> by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn</color>.

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Reduces Dark Devil Dance Cooldown by 2 turns

description: Attacks all enemies.\nIf this attack scores a critical hit, increases Critical Damage. After using this skill, reduces the skill cooldown of <color=#28d9ed>Dark Devil Dance</color> by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn</color>.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: Increases Critical Hit Chance of the attack by <color=#28d9ed>50%</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> chance to increase <color=#28d9ed>Critical Hit Chance</color> of the caster for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: Increases Critical Hit Chance of the attack by <color=#28d9ed>50%</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000002_backup_1_1]</color> chance to increase <color=#28d9ed>Critical Hit Chance</color> of the caster for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000002_backup_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
